descText.borrow: Use this page to locate prospective credit offers

descText.pool: Use the form below to create a Bitshares liquidity pool exchange.
descText.portfolio: This page provides an overview of your account balances, open orders and recent activities.

descText.smartcoin: Use the form below to issue collateralized debt into existence

descText.stake: Use this form to stake your assets in liquidity pools
descText.transfer: Use the form below to transfer assets to other blockchain users
descText.nodes: Connect to the blockchain via a node of your choice
descText.offers: Monitor and manage your credit offers with the below form.
descText.vesting: Monitor and withdraw your vesting balances with the below form.
descText.create_prediction: Use the form below to create a prediction market asset.

descText.tfunds: Find, create, update or delete Same-T funds below!
